title: Threedom Trailer
description: Hosts Scott Aukerman, Lauren Lapkus and Paul F. Tompkins abandon their regular show formats to spend some quality time together. Inspired by their fun conversations on tour, these three friends sit down to discuss each other, the world and everything in between. Listen to the first two episodes October 4th.
author: fanmail@earwolf.com (Earwolf & Scott Aukerman, Paul F Tompkins, Lauren Lapkus)
